text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-11-1/" title="1 Chronicles 11:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Then all Israel gathered themselves to David unto Hebron, saying, Behold, we *are* thy bone and thy flesh.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-2/" title="1 Chronicles 11:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And moreover in time past, even when Saul was king, thou *wast* he that leddest out and broughtest in Israel: and the LORD thy God said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be ruler over my people Israel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-3/" title="1 Chronicles 11:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Therefore came all the elders of Israel to the king to Hebron; and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before the LORD; and they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of the LORD by Samuel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-4/" title="1 Chronicles 11:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, which *is* Jebus; where the Jebusites *were*, the inhabitants of the land.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-5/" title="1 Chronicles 11:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not come hither. Nevertheless David took the castle of Zion, which *is* the city of David.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-6/" title="1 Chronicles 11:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And David said, Whosoever smiteth the Jebusites first shall be chief and captain. So Joab the son of Zeruiah went first up, and was chief.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-7/" title="1 Chronicles 11:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And David dwelt in the castle; therefore they called it the city of David.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-8/" title="1 Chronicles 11:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And he built the city round about, even from Millo round about: and Joab repaired the rest of the city.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-9/" title="1 Chronicles 11:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 So David waxed greater and greater: for the LORD of hosts *was* with him.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-10/" title="1 Chronicles 11:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 These also *are* the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who strengthened themselves with him in his kingdom, *and* with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of the LORD concerning Israel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-11/" title="1 Chronicles 11:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And this *is* the number of the mighty men whom David had; Jashobeam, an Hachmonite, the chief of the captains: he lifted up his spear against three hundred slain *by him* at one time.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-12/" title="1 Chronicles 11:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And after him *was* Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who *was one* of the three mighties.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-13/" title="1 Chronicles 11:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where was a parcel of ground full of barley; and the people fled from before the Philistines.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-14/" title="1 Chronicles 11:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And they set themselves in the midst of *that* parcel, and delivered it, and slew the Philistines; and the LORD saved *them* by a great deliverance.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-15/" title="1 Chronicles 11:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Now three of the thirty captains went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the host of the Philistines encamped in the valley of Rephaim.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-16/" title="1 Chronicles 11:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And David *was* then in the hold, and the Philistines' garrison *was* then at Bethlehem.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-17/" title="1 Chronicles 11:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem, that *is* at the gate!

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-18/" title="1 Chronicles 11:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And the three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem, that *was* by the gate, and took *it*, and brought *it* to David: but David would not drink *of* it, but poured it out to the LORD,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-19/" title="1 Chronicles 11:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And said, My God forbid it me, that I should do this thing: shall I drink the blood of these men that have put their lives in jeopardy? for with *the jeopardy of* their lives they brought it. Therefore he would not drink it. These things did these three mightiest.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-20/" title="1 Chronicles 11:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three: for lifting up his spear against three hundred, he slew *them*, and had a name among the three.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-21/" title="1 Chronicles 11:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 Of the three, he was more honourable than the two; for he was their captain: howbeit he attained not to the *first* three.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-22/" title="1 Chronicles 11:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man of Kabzeel, who had done many acts; he slew two lionlike men of Moab: also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowy day.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-23/" title="1 Chronicles 11:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And he slew an Egyptian, a man of *great* stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian's hand *was* a spear like a weaver's beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-24/" title="1 Chronicles 11:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 These *things* did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-25/" title="1 Chronicles 11:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 Behold, he was honourable among the thirty, but attained not to the *first* three: and David set him over his guard.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-26/" title="1 Chronicles 11:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 Also the valiant men of the armies *were*, Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-27/" title="1 Chronicles 11:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-28/" title="1 Chronicles 11:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Antothite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-29/" title="1 Chronicles 11:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-30/" title="1 Chronicles 11:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-31/" title="1 Chronicles 11:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah, *that pertained* to the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-32/" title="1 Chronicles 11:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-33/" title="1 Chronicles 11:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-34/" title="1 Chronicles 11:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 The sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shage the Hararite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-35/" title="1 Chronicles 11:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35 Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-36/" title="1 Chronicles 11:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36 Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-37/" title="1 Chronicles 11:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37 Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-38/" title="1 Chronicles 11:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38 Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Haggeri,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-39/" title="1 Chronicles 11:39 KJV verse detail"><span id="41" class="versehover">39 Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armourbearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-40/" title="1 Chronicles 11:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40 Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-41/" title="1 Chronicles 11:41 KJV verse detail"><span id="43" class="versehover">41 Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-42/" title="1 Chronicles 11:42 KJV verse detail"><span id="44" class="versehover">42 Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-43/" title="1 Chronicles 11:43 KJV verse detail"><span id="45" class="versehover">43 Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-44/" title="1 Chronicles 11:44 KJV verse detail"><span id="46" class="versehover">44 Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel the sons of Hothan the Aroerite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-45/" title="1 Chronicles 11:45 KJV verse detail"><span id="47" class="versehover">45 Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-46/" title="1 Chronicles 11:46 KJV verse detail"><span id="48" class="versehover">46 Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-11-47/" title="1 Chronicles 11:47 KJV verse detail"><span id="49" class="versehover">47 Eliel, and Obed, and Jasiel the Mesobaite.
